00026 bp_api_struct* uvm_ml_event::_bp_provided_api = NULL;

00028 uvm_ml_event::uvm_ml_event(const string &name) : uvm_event(name), _pool(NULL) {
00029 }

00031 void uvm_ml_event::set_pool(uvm_ml_event_pool * pool) {
00032   _pool = pool;

00045 void uvm_ml_event::notify_without_bp_notification(uvm_object* obj) {
00046   uvm_event::notify(obj);
00047 }
00048 
00049 void uvm_ml_event::notify(uvm_object* obj) {
00050   notify_without_bp_notification(obj);
00051   notify_ml_event(UVM_ML_EVENT_TRIGGER, obj);
00052 }
00053 
00054 void uvm_ml_event::reset_without_bp_notification() {
00055   uvm_event::reset();
00056 }
00057 
00058 void uvm_ml_event::reset() {
00059   reset_without_bp_notification();
00060   notify_ml_event(UVM_ML_EVENT_RESET);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void uvm_ml_event::notify_event_by_name(const char *                   scope_name,
00064                                         const char *                   event_name,
00065                                         uvm_ml_event_notify_action     action,
00066                                         unsigned int                   stream_size,
00067                                         uvm_ml_stream_t                stream,
00068                                         uvm_ml_time_unit               time_unit,
00069                                         double                         time_value){
00070   ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00071 
00072   uvm_object *       obj_val;
00073   uvm_ml_packer_int  packer;
00074   uvm_ml_packed_obj& packed_obj = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00075 
00076   uvm_ml_event_pool * pool = dynamic_cast<uvm_ml_event_pool*>(uvm_ml_event_pool::get_pool(scope_name));
00077   assert(pool);
00078   uvm_ml_event * e = NULL;
00079 
00080   if (pool->exists(event_name)) {
00081     if (action == UVM_ML_EVENT_DELETE) {
00082       pool->remove_without_bp_notification(event_name); 
00083       EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00084       return;
00085     }
00086   }
00087   
00088   uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(packed_obj, stream_size, stream);
00089   packer.set_from_uvm_ml_packed_obj(&packed_obj);
00090 
00091   // FIXME:  Need to check that the data type is supported
00092   //         prior to packing else this will result in an error
00093   packer >> obj_val;
00094   
00095   e = dynamic_cast<uvm_ml_event*>(pool->get(event_name));
00096   assert(e);
00097   
00098   switch(action) {
00099     case UVM_ML_EVENT_NEW : break;
00100     case UVM_ML_EVENT_TRIGGER :
00101       e->notify_without_bp_notification(obj_val);
00102       break;
00103     case UVM_ML_EVENT_RESET :
00104       e->reset_without_bp_notification();
00105       break;
00106     default : break;
00107   }
00108 
00109   EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00110 }
00111 
00112 
00113 void uvm_ml_event::notify_ml_event(uvm_ml_event_notify_action     action,
00114                                    uvm_object *                   obj) {
00115   uvm_ml_packed_obj & packed_obj = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00116   sc_core::sc_time current_time  = sc_core::sc_time_stamp(); 
00117   double           time_sec      = current_time.to_seconds();
00118   unsigned         framework_id  = uvm_ml_utils::FrameworkId();
00119   int              size          = 0;
00120 
00121   uvm_ml_packer_pack(obj, &packed_obj);
00122   size = (packed_obj.size-1)/32 + 1; 
00123   assert(_bp_provided_api);
00124   assert(_pool);
00125   (*_bp_provided_api->notify_event_ptr)(framework_id, _pool->get_full_name().c_str(), get_name().c_str(), action, size, packed_obj.val, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec); 
00126 }

00128 // Note:  Initialize is only allowed to be run once
00129 void uvm_ml_event_pool::initialize()
00130 {
00131     // Factory override uvm_event_pool with uvm_ml_event_pool
00132     if(uvm::uvm_factory::is_uvm_object_registered("uvm_ml_event_pool") == false)
00133     {
00134         uvm::uvm_factory::register_uvm_object_creator("uvm_ml_event_pool",new uvm_ml_event_pool::uvm_object_creator_uvm_pool());
00135     }
00136 }
00137 
00138 uvm_event* uvm_ml_event_pool::get (const string& name) {
00139   uvm_ml_event* item;
00140   std::map< string, uvm_event* >::iterator it;
00141   it = _pool_map.find(name);
00142   if (it == _pool_map.end())
00143   {
00144     item = new uvm_ml_event(name);
00145     item->set_pool(this);
00146     _pool_map[name] = item;
00147   }
00148   return _pool_map[name];
00149 }
00150 
00151 bool uvm_ml_event_pool::remove (const string &name) {
00152   if (exists(name)) {
00153     uvm_ml_event* e = dynamic_cast<uvm_ml_event*>(get(name));
00154     assert(e);
00155     e->notify_ml_event(UVM_ML_EVENT_DELETE);
00156   }
00157   return remove_without_bp_notification(name);
00158 }
00159 
00160 bool uvm_ml_event_pool::remove_without_bp_notification (const string &name) {
00161   std::map<string, uvm_event*>::iterator it;
00162   it = _pool_map.find(name);
00163   if (it == _pool_map.end())
00164   {
00165     return false;
00166   }
00167   else
00168   {
00169     _pool_map.erase(name);
00170     return true;
00171   }
00172 }
